attributes.action: Add Zimbabwe to the Axis of Evil.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, accept the application written in the blood of an unknown number of innocent citizens of Zimbabwe.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear and specific call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
